name: Haighper Lewp
description:
Welcome to HL Labs!  We're currently leading the charge in multi-dimensional particle experimentation. We're so glad you volunteered for the temporal anomaly program! 

Controls:

  • Left Mouse - Move
  • Space - Inspect
  • Enter - Interact
  • Escape - Stop Inspecting
  • Tab - Main Menu
  • Backspace - Exit Game

Let us know what your Temporal ID was when you completed the game in the comments below!

This game was submitted for Ludum Dare 47: "Stuck in a Loop"
